resources.string: James Gosling (19.05.1995.) is a Canadian computer scientist, best known as the founder and lead designer behind the Java programming language.
Steven Paul Jobs (24.02.1955. - 05.08.2011.) was an American business magnate and investor. He was the chairman, (CEO), and co-founder of Apple Inc.
Andrew E. Rubin (1963) is an American computer programmer, engineer, entrepreneur, and venture capitalist. He is the co-founder of Android Inc.
